document.full_text: as you watch the stars of a kennedy center revival of 'follies' put on glittery costumes and make like comics from a broadway of yore, you realize just why the show is one of the greatest musicals ever written.
document.title: theater review | 'follies': broadway babies' glory days
lines_and_colors: as you watch the stars of a kennedy center revival of 'follies' put on glittery costumes and make like comics from a broadway of yore, you realize just why the show is one of the greatest musicals ever written.
